overview: Lautaro (11 years old) and José (6) learned to find, in what others throw away, the daily sustenance their family needs. Lautaro protects his little brother from a situation that is suspected to be violent between his parents. The next day, José discovers a message in his World Cup figurine album. Messi's, his favorite, no longer looks like before. Neither did his family.
title: La de Messi
